error.no-property-owner: No property owner found for uri: {{uri}}

header.time-frame-tooltip: This node is hidden because the current time is outside its specified time frame. It will not be visible even if enabled

remove-sgn.label: Delete
remove-sgn.warning: Cannot delete the current focus node
remove-sgn.tooltip: Remove this scene graph node (and all of its child nodes) from the scene

modal.title: Confirm action
modal.description: Are you sure you want to remove the scene graph node: <propertyOwner/> This action is irreversible and will also remove all nodes in the scene tree that depend on this node!

node-view.missing-sgn: This scene graph node does not exist. It might have been removed since this view was opened

tooltip.has-renderable: Properties that control the visuals of this object
tooltip.no-renderable: This scene graph node has no renderable

transform.title: Transform
transform.tooltip: Properties that control the position, scale, and orientation of this object
transform.no-transform: This scene graph node has no transform

time-frame.title: Time

tooltip.tab-tooltip: Information about the time frame for when the object is visible
tooltip.active-status: This object is currently active and will be visible
tooltip.inactive-status: This object is currently inactive due to its time frame and will not be visible

time-frame.info: The object will not be visible outside the specified time range

info.title: Info
info.tooltip: Information abou the scene graph node and its asset

other.title: Other
other.tooltip: Other properties of the scene graph node

settings.tooltip: Additional settings to filter search result

visible.label: Show only visible
visible.tooltip: Show only nodes that are currenlty visible, meaning enabled and not faded out.

focusable.label: Show only focusable
focusable.tooltip: Hide scene graph nodes that are not markes as focusable, meaning that they cannot be directly set as the focus node in the scene.

hidden.label: Show objects with GUI hidden flag
hidden.tooltip: Show scene graph nodes that are marked as hidden in the GUI part of the asset. These are otherwise hidden in the interface.
